Our company Linux Virtual Private Servers (VPS) are usually setup upon Highly effective Dual Quad Core Xeon servers with the help of outstanding on the web connectivity to make sure that each and every VPS provides you with the best possible operation and will be offering the flexibleness in order to operate significant web-sites together with install third party software programs quickly and completely.

Our plans of Linux Hosting VPS are based on a faster technology and virtualization to make sure the reliability of a small budget.

Access we offer as under:

• VPS root full access.
• Option of operating system Debian, SUSE, CentOS, Red Hat , or Fedora.
• if not in particular requested, default be CentOS Linux operating system.
• Red hat require an extra authorization license.
